prod_desc: Stop Catwoman™ escaping with the diamonds!
prod_long_desc:
Help Batgirl™ and Robin™ thwart a jewel heist in THE LEGO® BATMAN MOVIE: Catwoman™ Catcycle Chase set, including the Catcycle and a buildable street scene with a jewelry store. Play-starting features include a lamppost with tipping function to knock over during the getaway pursuit, translucent diamond-style elements, plus Catwoman’s whip and Batgirl’s Batarangs. Includes three minifigures.
Includes three minifigures: Catwoman™, Batgirl™ and Robin™.
The Catwoman™ Catcycle features a minifigure seat, printed dashboard, big wheels with rubber tires, engine elements and a translucent headlight-style element.
The buildable street scene features a jewelry store with a window and opening door, both with translucent glass-style elements, shop sign on the roof plus two translucent diamond-style elements. The street outside includes a lamppost with tip-over function and trash can.
Knock over the lamppost with the Catcycle.
Weapons include Catwoman’s whip and Batgirl’s two yellow Batarangs.
Accessory elements include Batgirl and Robin’s capes.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 7+.
Catwoman™ Catcycle measures over 1” high, 5” long and 1” wide.
Street scene excluding lamppost measures over 3” high, 3” wide and 1” long.
Lamppost stands over 4” tall.
